hero.title: AI Face Analysis Lab
hero.subtitle:
AI analyzes your face!
Enjoy fun tests like Ugly Meter, MBTI, Age Estimator, First Impression, and Celebrity Look-Alike.

ugly.title: Ugly Meter
ugly.desc: AI scores your ugliness level and shows your tier humorously.

mbti.title: MBTI by Face
mbti.desc: AI predicts your MBTI type from your facial features.

age.title: AI Age Estimator
age.desc: AI estimates the age of your face in the photo.

vibe.title: First Impression Test
vibe.desc: AI gives you a first impression analysis!

lookalike.title: Celebrity Look-Alike
lookalike.desc: AI finds a celebrity who looks like you!
